title: Cool change
creator_credit: Delatite Productions, Dennis Wright and George Miller
brief_description: Set in the highlands of Victoria, deals with a bitter struggle between the greenies and the cattlemen. When the government moves to evict a woman who is running more cattle on her property than the law allows, the other cattlemen band together to battle on her behalf.
creator_credit_for_label: Delatite Productions, Dennis Wright and George Miller
